project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement function to read CSV file and parse data
Implement main function to interact with the user and display results
Write tests for each of the calculations and main function interactions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
